mapper.select: select id from SYS_ORGANIZATION s where s.PARENT_ID #{id}

select s.ID, s.ORG_LAYER, s.ORG_NAME, s.ORG_SORT, s.ORG_OWNER, s.CREATE_USER, s.PARENT_ID, s.STATUS, s.ORG_LEVEL, s.ORG_CODE, s.ORG_TYPE from SYS_ORGANIZATION s where s.flag = 1
s.ORG_NAME like '%'|| #{orgName}||'%'
and s.ORG_CODE like '%'|| #{orgCode}||'%'

select s.ID, s.ORG_LAYER, s.ORG_NAME, s.ORG_SORT, s.ORG_OWNER, s.CREATE_USER, s.PARENT_ID, s.STATUS, s.ORG_LEVEL, s.ORG_CODE, s.ORG_TYPE, so.org_name as parentName from SYS_ORGANIZATION s left join SYS_ORGANIZATION so on s.parent_id = so.id where s.flag = 1
s.ORG_NAME like '%'|| #{orgName}||'%'
and s.ORG_CODE like '%'|| #{orgCode}||'%'
and s.PARENT_ID = #{id}
order by s.org_layer
select SO.ID, SO.ORG_LAYER, SO.ORG_NAME,SO.PARENT_ID from sys_organization so start with id = #{id} connect by prior id = parent_id
